business.headline: Iconic Furniture Removals - AMN159
business.description:
A unique opportunity exists in the furniture removals & storage industry, with a Turnover of $2.5m+ located on the outskirts of Brisbane. Offering services of full pre packing, local, country & interstate deliveries, there is no doubt this is an opportunity not to be missed.
What you are getting: * The business would ideally suit a husband & wife team or an individual who would enjoy the casual lifestyle of this niche industry that is more relaxed than general freight. Alternatively, this is now a business that can definitely run under management if required * A very highly regarded business name & reputation second to none with high recommendations that keep generating business * All plant & equipment is unencumbered, nothing on lease * Included in the asking price is a well maintained fleet comprising of 12 trucks & 3 trailers. Also included are all the trolleys, packing & racks, plus the goodwill. As this is a well established transport removals business, the current owner is willing to stay on for a flexible handover period to ensure a smooth transition in the change of ownership
This business boasts being the biggest removals on Brisbane's Northside with an extensive repeat client base & offers a secure well-established foothold in the Brisbane market. With its highly trained staff & well maintained fleet of trucks, the business offers clients a comprehensive commercial and residential removalist solution. There is no doubt this is a unique opportunity not to be missed.
Call Broker: Marilyn Barnes 0458 418 110
ABS-Sunshine Coast Office 07 5479 0055 www.abssunshinecoast.com.au
Ref# AMN159

business.headline: Paintless Dent Repairs
business.description:
Specialising in Paintless Dent Repairs on Motor Vehicles with hail damage or minor dents, this business was established by the current owners in 1999 and opened in 2002 on the Sunshine Coast. It has experienced constant growth, not only from hail storms and bad weather conditions but from ever increasing demands for this style of dent repairs. Insurance companies and motor vehicle dealers have recognised the savings to them, created by this type of repair method.
This business has a long established client base and provides its services to some of the largest and most prestigious motor vehicle dealers and panel shops on the sunshine coast as well as private customers.
* Established since 1999 and opened in 2002 on the Sunshine Coast * Fully equipped vehicle for the mobile operations * Centrally located work shop * Large client base on the Sunshine Coast * Insurance company recommendations * Motor Vehicle Dealer recommendations * Strong profit margins and room for expansion * Paintless dent repairs (PDR) * Hail damage repairs * Minor dents & dings * Shopping trolley dents * Insurance & private work * Environment-friendly * Paintless dent repairs * Experienced professional service * Maintains original condition of vehicle * Cost effective car dents & hail repairs
